description: Styles for managing themes and layout in a tic-tac-toe web game application.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main application container with center alignment and theme-based background.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header section of the app, featuring theme colors, flex layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Link styles that change color based on theme.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes.
